user.description:
Starting in 2021, SimpliSafe has moved to a new authentication mechanism via its web app. Due to technical limitations, there is a manual step at the end of this process; please ensure that you read the [documentation](http://home-assistant.io/integrations/simplisafe#getting-an-authorization-code) before starting.

1. Click [here]({url}) to open the SimpliSafe web app and input your credentials.

2. When the login process is complete, return here and input the authorization code below.

abort.already_configured: This SimpliSafe account is already in use.
abort.wrong_account: The user credentials provided do not match this SimpliSafe account.
